mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BAIRONG_TRN_REQUEST ( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER,TRN_ID, REQUEST_CHANNEL, QUERY_MODE, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NO, NAME, MOBILE ) VALUES ( SYS_GUID(),SYSDATE,'PLAZE', #{trnId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{rqChannel, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{queryMode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{certType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{certNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mobile, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
